thread.section_title: Ultimate Office Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ultimate Office | ultimateoffice.com
thread.title: William Pearse
thread.title_full: Ultimate Office reviewed by William Pearse

author: William Pearse
title: William Pearse
text:
I purchased an item that turned out not to work with my office set-up. Ultimate Office customer service personnel were very polite, efficient, and provided the exact info I needed to get the item shipped back and credited.
Although I didn't even buy anything, I was very favorably impressed with the company.
